title: Himi 306
lyrics:
8’s & 6’s
1.
Kapau ‘’oku tau mo’ui
‘I he Laumālie lelei,
‘O hotau ‘Otua,
Pea ‘oku tau ongo’i,
‘Ene fakaakeake,
Hotau laumālie.
2.
Pea ke tau fa’a kumi,
Ki he’ene akonaki,
Kia kitautolu,
Ke ne fakatokanga’i,
Hotau loto ki he lelei,
Fakalaumālie.
3.
Pea ke ne tokoni mai
Ki he’etau loto kumi,
Ki hotau Huhu’i,
Ko e’uhi ke tau tui,
Pea hao ‘o mo’ui,
Hotau laumālie.
4.
Pea ke tau fai mo’oni,
‘O tau mo e loto tui,
Pea taunima’i
‘Ene ngaahi fekau lelei,
Pea ‘e monū’ia ai,
Hotau laumālie. *
